Question
========
The standard deviation indicates approximately the average amount that scores in a distribution vary from the median.

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False


Solution
========
The standard deviation indicates approximately the average amount that scores in a distribution vary from the mean, not the median.

Answerlist
----------
* This answer is incorrect.
* This answer is correct.
